A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sure\, Star Wars: The Last Jedi looked great\, but the story was so poorly crafted the script wouldn't have survived the first round of a screenplay contest. Cliffhangers from \"Force Awakens\" were routinely ignored or openly disrepected. And speaking of disrespect\, Luke Skywalker was stripped of everything that made him an iconic character in the first place\, and disposed of in the end like stale leftovers.
